rows.label: tev001892_MSG0001
rows.name: Shhhh! I'm trying to think here! Don't interrupt.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001892_MSG0002
rows.name:
Now, how exactly am I supposed to get in and out of
Sakuraba Industries without being detected? Hmmm...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001892_MSG0003
rows.name:
Night security seems pretty airtight, so I may need to
go during the day. Maybe I can pretend to be part of
the cleaning crew? I just need a mop...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001892_MSG0004
rows.name: H-huh? Chief! Is that you?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001892_MSG0005
rows.name:
I was just...thinking out loud. Yeah, that's the ticket.
More meaningless blabber from good ol' Mia![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001892_JNK0010
rows.name: Chastise

rows.label: tev001892_SEL0011
rows.name: Scold Mia, then stop her before she commits a crime.

rows.label: tev001892_JNK0020
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: tev001892_SEL0021
rows.name: Pretend that you didn't hear anything.

rows.label: tev001892_MSG0006
rows.name: I've had just about enough of your scheming, Chief![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001892_MSG0007
rows.name:
You just want to get me out of the way so you can
steal this mission for yourself![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001892_MSG0008
rows.name:
Normally I'm happy to share pretty much whatever,
but I'm not giving you this one. I took the mission,
and I'm gonna be the one to finish it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001892_MSG0009
rows.name: So quit bugging me, you...you...you bugger![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001892_MSG0010
rows.name:
That's a lie, Chief! A dirty, dirty lie!
I KNOW you heard all my secret thoughts that I was
sitting here speaking out loud.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001892_MSG0011
rows.name:
Pretty funny coincidence how you always happen to
be right over my shoulder during key parts of this job,
hmmm? Hmmmmmmmm?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001892_MSG0012
rows.name:
Oh, you heard me all right. You waited until you had
everything you needed and THEN you decided to
reveal yourself! Pretty sneaky-sneaky, Chief.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001892_MSG0013
rows.name:
But I'm not gonna let you steal this mission from me.
I took it, and I'm gonna be the one to finish it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001892_MSG0014
rows.name: So stop trying to thief all my business![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001892_JNK0030
rows.name: Inquire Calmly

rows.label: tev001892_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Mia if there is anything you can do to help.

rows.label: tev001892_JNK0040
rows.name: Act Boldly

rows.label: tev001892_SEL0041
rows.name: Knock Mia out to stop her from committing a crime.

rows.label: tev001892_MSG0015
rows.name:
Hmm... Help from ol' Chief [ST:gender p1=himself p2=herself ]?
I suppose that IS tempting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001892_MSG0016
rows.name:
I mean, this IS a tough job, and there ARE some things
I could use help with...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001892_MSG0017
rows.name: But nope! I've gotta do 'em myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001892_MSG0018
rows.name: It's scary doing it alone, but also less risky.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001892_MSG0019
rows.name:
So if you really want to help, just give me your full
trust and support. Okay, Chief? That's all I want.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001892_MSG0020
rows.name:
Now I need to work out plans B, C, and D,
so you'll have to excuse me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001892_MSG0021
rows.name: We'll talk again once all this is over.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001892_MSG0022
rows.name: Stop! You stop right there, [ST:gender p1=buddy p2=missy ]![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001892_MSG0023
rows.name:
I know that look in your eyes! You were...
You were going to MURDER me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001892_MSG0024
rows.name:
Over my dead body will you murder me, Chief!
Ummm... I mean... You go to hell![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001892_MSG0025
rows.name:
...Huh? You were just going to knock me out?
Well that's exactly as bad! All my hard work and
planning and junk would have been for nothing![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001892_MSG0026
rows.name:
And then all of humanity would pay the price for your
foolish foolishness.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001892_MSG0027
rows.name: Look, Chief, you just have to trust Mia on this one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001892_MSG0028
rows.name:
I'm gonna go in, take what I need, and get right back
out again without committing even a single crime.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001892_MSG0029
rows.name:
Anyway, I need to work out the details of my totally
awesome plan, so you'll have to excuse me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001892_MSG0030
rows.name: We'll talk again once all this is over.[ST:wait ]
